The University of Texas at Austin; *February, 2020* * **Poster**: Bayesian autoregressive models for waiting times of recurrent events. *Bayesian Young Statisticians Meeting (BAYSM), Florence (Italy); June, 2016* ## Research Interests * Bayesian statistics * Multilevel modeling * Longitudinal data * Missing data * Reproducible workflows
